# How is Java related to our robot?

Obviously, you are in robotics club! How is Java essential to programming a robot?

The robot is controlled by a little guy named the RoboRIO:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

This is its own computer that controls all of the devices on our robot. We will go into much more detail later once you finish learning the basics of Java.

The RoboRIO has a JRE on it, meaning it can run Java code that we create!

All you need to do is to install the JDK on your computer and the FRC robot library - WPILib.

WPILib is a set of classes and functions that allows you to control the RoboRIO from Java!

> What are these big words!?!??!?! Classes? Functions? Libraries?

Those big words will be explained later as we get to them. No one said programming is easy!
